keyMoments.title: Smoker Uses Jitte Against Luffy
keyMoments.description: Smoker uses his Seastone-tipped jitte to pin Luffy down, exploiting the weapon's ability to negate Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the effectiveness of Seastone weapons against Devil Fruit users.

description: Smoker's signature weapon, a jitte (truncheon) with a Seastone tip. The Seastone allows it to negate Devil Fruit powers and strike Logia users.
abilities: Can negate Devil Fruit powers on contact
significance: One of the few Seastone weapons shown in the series, making Smoker particularly dangerous to Devil Fruit users despite being a relatively lower-ranked Marine.
